bibl.title: The Stanzaic Architecture of Early Greek Elegy.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 72-73: Adespota Elegiaca 27 ('Elephantine Poem'); - 138-155: Revival. Callimachus, Aetia 1-38 ('Prologue').
FARAONE Christopher A., The Stanzaic Architecture of Early Greek Elegy.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2008, 8°, xii-200 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-923698-5. £45.
